select.id: get高額合算データ
get事業高額データ
get事業高額合算データ
get被保険者台帳と宛名情報

mapper.select:
SELECT "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai".*, ,
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbV1001HihokenshaDaichoAlive" AS "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN
AS ON "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" = ."shikibetsuCode"

select.id: エラー登録

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT 振込明細一時TBL."hihokenshaNo" FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL WHERE 振込明細一時TBL."shikibetsuCode" = '' OR 振込明細一時TBL."shikibetsuCode" IS NULL

select.id: get口座情報

mapper.select: SELECT 振込明細一時TBL.*, "koza".* FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL INNER JOIN () AS "koza" ON 振込明細一時TBL."kozaID" = "koza"."uaT0310Koza_kozaId" WHERE 振込明細一時TBL."shiharaiHohoKubunCode" = '2'

select.id: get振込対象データ

mapper.select:
WITH 振込対象 AS (SELECT 振込明細一時TBL.*, 振込明細一時TBL."hihokenshaNo"||振込明細一時TBL."serviceTeikyoYM"||振込明細一時TBL."taishoNendo"||振込明細一時TBL."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo"||振込明細一時TBL."rirekiNo" AS "比較キー" FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL WHERE 0 <= 振込明細一時TBL."furikomiKingaku" AND 振込明細一時TBL."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE ) SELECT 振込明細1.*, 振込明細2.* FROM (SELECT mst.* FROM 振込対象 AS mst WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM 振込対象 AS slv WHERE slv."kozaNayoseKey" = mst."kozaNayoseKey" AND slv."比較キー" < mst."比較キー" ) ) AS 振込明細1, (SELECT 振込明細一時TBL."kozaNayoseKey", COUNT(*) AS 件数, SUM(振込明細一時TBL."furikomiKingaku") AS 合計振込金額
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL WHERE 0 <= 振込明細一時TBL."furikomiKingaku" AND 振込明細一時TBL."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 振込明細一時TBL."kozaNayoseKey" ) AS 振込明細2 WHERE 振込明細1."kozaNayoseKey" = 振込明細2."kozaNayoseKey" ORDER BY 振込明細1."kozaNayoseKey" ASC, 振込明細1."比較キー" ASC

select.id: get依頼済の登録_高額合算

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" AS "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."taishoNendo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."taishoNendo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."shikyuSeiriNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."rirekiNo" WHERE 0 < "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE

select.id: get依頼済の登録_事業高額

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" AS "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."rirekiNo" WHERE 0 < "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE

select.id: get依頼済の登録_事業高額合算

mapper.select: SELECT , FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" AS "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."taishoNendo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."taishoNendo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."shikyuSeiriNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."rirekiNo" WHERE 0 < "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE

select.id: get依頼済の取消_高額合算

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" AS "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."taishoNendo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."taishoNendo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."shikyuSeiriNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3074KogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."rirekiNo" WHERE "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" = 0 OR "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = FALSE

select.id: get依頼済の取消_事業高額

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" AS "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3111JigyoKogakuShikyuHanteiKekka"."rirekiNo" WHERE "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" = 0 OR "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = FALSE

select.id: get依頼済の取消_事業高額合算

mapper.select: SELECT , FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" AS "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei" ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."taishoNendo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."taishoNendo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."hokenshaNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."shikyuSeiriNo" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" = "DbT3174JigyoKogakuGassanShikyuFushikyuKettei"."rirekiNo" WHERE "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" = 0 OR "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = FALSE

select.id: select受給取得状況情報_高額合算と事業高額合算

mapper.select: WITH 受給者 AS( SELECT , "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai".* FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" ON "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."keisanShuryoYMD" AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE WHERE(("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yukoMukoKubun" = #{有効無効区分_1} AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."keisanShuryoYMD" <= "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD") OR ("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yukoMukoKubun" = #{有効無効区分_2} AND ("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."soshitsuYMD" IS NULL OR "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."soshitsuYMD" = '') AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = #{要介護状態区分コード_01} )) ) SELECT mst.*, "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho".* FROM 受給者 AS mst LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM 受給者 AS slv WHERE mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_hihokenshaNo" = slv."hihokenshaNo" AND mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_rirekiNo" || mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_edaban" < slv."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_rirekiNo" || slv."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_edaban" )

select.id: select受給取得状況情報_事業高額

mapper.select: WITH 受給者 AS( SELECT , "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai".* FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" ON "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" AND substring("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" from 1 for 6) <= "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE WHERE(("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yukoMukoKubun" = #{有効無効区分_1} AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" <= substring("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" from 1 for 6)) OR ("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yukoMukoKubun" = #{有効無効区分_2} AND ("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."soshitsuYMD" IS NULL OR "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."soshitsuYMD" = '') AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = #{要介護状態区分コード_01} )) ) SELECT mst.*, "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho".* FROM 受給者 AS mst LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM 受給者 AS slv WHERE mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_hihokenshaNo" = slv."hihokenshaNo" AND mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_rirekiNo" || mst."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_edaban" < slv."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_rirekiNo" || slv."dbT4001JukyushaDaicho_edaban" )

select.id: select申請データ有無確認情報

mapper.select: SELECT "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai".* FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" ON "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" = "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" AND substring("DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."jukyuShinseiYMD" from 1 for 6) <= "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."rirekiNo" = '0000'

select.id: select出力対象データ

mapper.select: SELECT "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai".*, 名寄せ件数表.NUM FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" INNER JOIN ( SELECT "kozaNayoseKey", COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" WHERE 0 < "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY "kozaNayoseKey" ) AS 名寄せ件数表 ON "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaNayoseKey" = 名寄せ件数表."kozaNayoseKey" WHERE 0 < "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE ORDER BY "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kinyuKikanCode" ASC, "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kinyuKikanShitenCode" ASC, ${出力順} "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" ASC, "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" ASC, "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."taishoNendo" ASC, "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo" ASC, "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."rirekiNo" ASC

select.id: select振込エラーリスト情報

mapper.select: SELECT 振込明細.* FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細 WHERE 振込明細."kozaDataFlag" = FALSE ORDER BY 振込明細."hihokenshaNo", 振込明細."serviceTeikyoYM", 振込明細."taishoNendo", 振込明細."shikyuShinseishoSeiriNo", 振込明細."rirekiNo"

select.id: select処理結果確認リスト情報

mapper.select: SELECT 処理結果確認.* FROM "DbWT0512ShoriKekkaKakuninList" AS 処理結果確認 ORDER BY "errorKubun", "shoKisaiHokenshaNo", "hiHokenshaNo", "key1", "key2", "key3", "key4", "key5"

select.id: get処理日付管理マスタ

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" AS "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" WHERE "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode" = 'DBC' AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shichosonCode" = '000000' AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName" = #{処理名} AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriEdaban" ='0000' AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendo" ='0000' AND "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendoNaiRenban" ='0001'

select.id: get処理日付管理マスタなし

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" AS "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" WHERE 2 < 1
mapper.sql: "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_hihokenshaNo", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."idoYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."edaNo" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_edaNo", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."idoJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_idoJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shichosonCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shichosonCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikibetsuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuShutokuYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."hihokennshaKubunCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_hihokennshaKubunCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuHenkoJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuHenkoYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiKaijoYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."jushochiTokureiFlag" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_jushochiTokureiFlag", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."kyuShichosonCode" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_kyuShichosonCode", "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."logicalDeletedFlag" as "dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_logicalDeletedFlag"
